question: Which committee recommended the establishment of the scheme of ‘democratic decentralisation’?
option2: Committee on Rationalisation of Panchayat Statistics
option4: Study Team on Panchayati Raj Administration
explanation: The Balwant Rai Mehta committee submitted its report in November 1957. The committee recommended the establishment of the scheme of ‘democratic decentralisation’, which later came to be known as Panchayati Raj.
